00021 #ifndef ROBUST_ESTIMATORS_H
00022 #define ROBUST_ESTIMATORS_H
00023 
00024 #include <math.h>
00025 
00027 
00028 
00029 double rho_tukey_without_sqrt(const double x2, const double c);
00030 double rho_tukey_without_sqrt_derivative(const double x2, const double c);
00031 
00032 double rho_huber_without_sqrt(const double x2, const double c);
00033 double rho_huber_without_sqrt_derivative(const double x2, const double c);
00034 
00035 
00036 inline double rho_tukey_without_sqrt(const double x2, const double c)
00037 {
00038   double c2 = c * c;
00039 
00040   if (x2 > c2)
00041     return c2 / 6;
00042   else
00043   {
00044     double t = 1. - x2 / c2;
00045 
00046     return c2 / 6 * (1. - t * t * t);
00047   }
00048 }
00049 
00050 inline double rho_tukey_without_sqrt_derivative(const double x2, const double c)
00051 {
00052   double c2 = c * c;
00053 
00054   if (x2 > c2)
00055     return 0;
00056   else
00057   {
00058     double t = 1. - x2 / c2;
00059 
00060     return t * t / 2.;
00061   }
00062 }
00063 
00064 inline double rho_huber_without_sqrt(const double x2, const double c)
00065 {
00066   double c2 = c * c;
00067 
00068   if (x2 < c2)
00069     return x2;
00070   else
00071     return 2 * c * sqrt(x2) - c2;
00072 }
00073 
00074 inline double rho_huber_without_sqrt_derivative(const double x2, const double c)
00075 {
00076   double c2 = c * c;
00077 
00078   if (x2 < c2)
00079     return 1;
00080   else
00081     return c / sqrt(x2);
00082 }
00083 
00085 #endif // ROBUST_ESTIMATORS_H
